entry.title: Cadette Green EW25 - EasyWeed® HTV
entry.summary:
Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 4.50 - 365.00 (5 variants)

The most trusted heat transfer vinyl brand in the world

Siser EasyWeed is extremely durable, wash after wash It uses a lower pressure setting and a lower heat setting for its application.  EasyWeed is thinner than others on the market and offers a one-second tack application that’s great for multiple layers. EasyWeed has a pressure sensitive carrier that allows you to offer detailed designs on a wide variety of fabrics. EasyWeed can be cut with laser cutting systems.

These rolls are offered in 12 inch width (actual size 11.8)

EasyWeed is CPSIA Certified making it perfect for children’s clothing and accessories.

Application Instructions (heat press)

•  Mirror your image when cutting
• Weed excess material
• Preheat garment for 2-3 seconds
• Apply design at 305°F/150°C
• Use medium pressure for 10-15 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

Application instructions (home iron)

• Set iron dial between Cotton and Linen
• Cover design with parchment paper or non-stick cover sheet
• Place on flat, hard surface (ironing board not recommended)
• Press iron with medium/firm pressure (do not slide iron)
• Press each section of design for 10-15 seconds
• If areas of design lift after application, replace cover sheet
and re-press for 5-10 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

EasyWeed Applies to:

• 100% cotton
• Poly/cotton blends
• 100% polyester
• Leather

Laundering:

• Wait 24 hours before 1st wash
• Machine wash warm or cold/mild detergent
• Dry on normal dryer setting
• Do not dry clean

entry.title: Siser EasySubli MASK 20" x 1 Yard
entry.summary:
Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 9.00

Siser EasySubli™ Mask 

Siser Easy Subli Mask 20″ wide x 1 yard lengths to be used in conjunction with the SISER EasySubli. 

Remove the EasySubli Mask cold.

Siser's rolls are labeled 20″ wide actual width is 19.6″

EasySubli Mask is unlike other Siser TTD Mask products but the process is familiar. Use a squeegee to bond your printed EasySubli HTV to multiple pieces aligned and apply all at once. However, this mask is constructed differently and not compatible with other printed HTV products. 

  • Print and cut your design on your EasySubli Heat Transfer Vinyl sheet. Do not Mirror.
  • Weed your design.
  • Cut your EasySubli Mask and apply the mask to your design.
  • Burnish to ensure full adhesion.
  • Peel masking away with design attached.

  • Apply to garment, and press according to the EasySubli Heat Transfer Vinyl instructions

entry.title: Siser EasySubli Dye-Sub Paper HTV 20" x 1 Yard
entry.summary:
Vendor: Siser
Type:
Price: 22.50

EasySubli® Heat Transfer Vinyl

You already know that Siser glitter HTV can be sublimated. What if you don't want the sparkle?

The latest innovation in garment sublimation is here! EasySubli™ is the matte heat transfer vinyl that’s receptive to sublimation inks! Siser EasySubli™ HTV is the key to decorating coloured polyester and cotton blends. Never let yourself be limited to white polyester again when you switch to EasySubli™.

EasySubli® is a brand-new HTV by Siser® that allows you to print custom, full-color designs using your sublimation printer.

EasySubli can be fed directly through a sublimation printer, which eliminates the need for transfer papers. After printing, it is recommended that you allow the inks to dry for 2 hours before masking, or you can lay your design underneath an open heat press platen for about 45 seconds. While traditional sublimation is limited to white polyester garments,

EasySubli is also applied at a low temperature of 311°F, compared to 380°F and above for traditional sublimation.

EasySubli is designed to work with virtually any sublimation printer, however, we recommend Sawgrass® machines

EasySubli Inks by Sawgrass for best results.

To apply your designs to your garments you also need to use Sister TTD special application tape (this is COLD peel) BUY HERE

 Applies to: 100% Cotton, 100% Polyester, Poly/Cotton blends

Temperature: 311°F/155°C Time: 15 seconds

Pressure: Medium

Peel: Warm

Care instructions:

Wait 24 hours before the first wash.

Machine wash warm or cold with mild detergent

Dry on low dryer setting

Do not dry clean or bleach

Wash inside-out for best results

USE WITH SISER EASYSUBLI MASK FOUND HERE

The most trusted heat transfer vinyl brand in the world

Siser EasyWeed is extremely durable, wash after wash It uses a lower pressure setting and a lower heat setting for its application.  EasyWeed is thinner than others on the market and offers a one-second tack application that’s great for multiple layers. EasyWeed has a pressure sensitive carrier that allows you to offer detailed designs on a wide variety of fabrics. EasyWeed can be cut with laser cutting systems.

EasyWeed is CPSIA Certified making it perfect for children’s clothing and accessories.

Application Instructions (heat press)

•  Mirror your image when cutting
• Weed excess material
• Preheat garment for 2-3 seconds
• Apply design at 305°F/150°C
• Use medium pressure for 10-15 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

Application instructions (home iron)

• Set iron dial between Cotton and Linen
• Cover design with parchment paper or non-stick cover sheet
• Place on flat, hard surface (ironing board not recommended)
• Press iron with medium/firm pressure (do not slide iron)
• Press each section of design for 10-15 seconds
• If areas of design lift after application, replace cover sheet
and re-press for 5-10 seconds
• Peel carrier hot or cold

EasyWeed Applies to:

• 100% cotton
• Poly/cotton blends
• 100% polyester
• Leather

Laundering:

• Wait 24 hours before 1st wash
• Machine wash warm or cold/mild detergent
• Dry on normal dryer setting
• Do not dry clean
